title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories on the x axis representing Response, and Share of respondents in each Response on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Against where Share of respondents is 52.0.
The lowest category is found at I don´t know where Share of respondents is 8.0.
The highest value at Against is almost 6.5 times larger than the minimum value of I don´t know.
The highest value at Against is almost 6.5 times larger than the minimum value of I don´t know.
The difference between the max Response Against and min Response I don´t know is 44.0.
